body_html: We do ask contributors to squash, but if we require our clients to rebase, every time we accept another PR we'll have to ask the client to re-rebase :). Since we own the merging process, it makes more sense for us to do the rebasing.
body_text: We do ask contributors to squash, but if we require our clients to rebase, every time we accept another PR we'll have to ask the client to re-rebase :).  Since we own the merging process, it makes more sense for us to do the rebasing.
body: We do ask contributors to squash, but if we require our clients to rebase, every time we accept another PR we'll have to ask the client to re-rebase :).  Since we own the merging process, it makes more sense for us to do the rebasing.
